message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $8200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I can sell the product to you for $8500.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still thinking $7500 is a fair price for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I understand you're sticking to your guns. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I can sell the product to you for $8700.
I appreciate your willingness to make adjustments, but I'm still thinking $7200 is a fair price for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I can sell the product to you for $8400.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm at my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $7000. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
